name: Laginha Beach
description: Urban beach with calm waters and light sand, ideal for swimming and walking.

name: Monte Cara
description: Mountain shaped like a human face, an iconic symbol of the city.

name: Municipal Market
description: Traditional market with fresh produce and local crafts.

name: People's Palace
description: Historic building with colonial architecture and cultural exhibits.

name: Belém Tower
description: Replica of the Portuguese tower, located on the seafront.

name: Mindelo Cultural Center
description: Cultural space with exhibitions, music, and local art.

name: Praça Nova Square
description: Central square with gardens, benches, and lively nightlife.

name: Bird Islet
address: Front of the coast of Mindelo
description: Small island with unique biodiversity, ideal for birdwatching.
